dashboardMetadata.name: ðŸ”Ž Book Travel Journey Revenue Overview

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Risk Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and (userExperienceScore ="TOLERATED" or userExperienceScore ="FRUSTRATED" or userExperienceScore ="UNDEFINED")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Lost Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and not ((useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf"))

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "New User Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and newUser IS true

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Returning User Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and newUser IS false

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Risk Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and (userExperienceScore ="TOLERATED" or userExperienceScore ="FRUSTRATED" or userExperienceScore ="UNDEFINED")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Lost Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and not ((useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf"))

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average New User Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and newUser IS true

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Returning User Order Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and newUser IS false

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select DISTINCT DATETIME(starttime, "HH:mm", "10m") as "Time", sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select DISTINCT DATETIME(starttime, "HH:mm", "10m") as "Time", avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Cart Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf")

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select DISTINCT DATETIME(starttime, "HH:mm", "10m") as "Time", sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Lost Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and not ((useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf"))

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select DISTINCT DATETIME(starttime, "HH:mm", "10m") as "Time", avg(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Average Lost Cart Value" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and not ((useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf"))

tiles.query: select DISTINCT DATETIME(starttime, "HH:mm", "10m") as "Time", sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "New User Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and newUser IS true

tiles.query: select DISTINCT DATETIME(starttime, "HH:mm", "10m") as "Time", sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Returning User Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and newUser IS false

tiles.query: select DISTINCT DATETIME(starttime, "HH:mm", "10m") as "Time", sum(usersession.doubleProperties.revenue) as "Risk Revenue" FROM usersession where useraction.application="EasyTravel"  and (useraction.name="loading of page /") AND (useraction.name="click on login") AND (useraction.name="click on search") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-review.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-payment.jsf") AND (useraction.name="loading of page /orange-booking-finish.jsf") and (userExperienceScore ="TOLERATED" or userExperienceScore ="FRUSTRATED" or userExperienceScore ="UNDEFINED")
